title: Soccer stats actor Input Schema
description: This is the input schema to use this actor.

type.title: type
type.description: Defines the information that will be scraped. If you are scraping matches between two weeks, you should also define array of two weeks as the selectedWeeks input

leagues.title: leagues
leagues.description: Array of leagues that will be scraped. Available leagues: brazil, czechrepublic, germany, germany2, denmark, england, england2, spain, spain2, france, france2, greece, netherlands, italy, italy2, poland, portugal, russia, turkey

selectedWeeks.title: selectedWeeks
selectedWeeks.description: Selects the starting week and the ending week if you are scraping matchweeks from given two weeks. Array length must be 2.

useProxy.title: useProxy
useProxy.description: Selects if you want to use a proxy.
